biscotti.io

Class Archives

  • java.lang.Object
    • biscotti.io.Archives

  • public final class Archives
extends Object
    Static utility methods useful for working with ZipFiles.
    Author:
    Zhenya Leonov

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Predicate<ZipEntry> DIRECTORY
      A predicate which tests if a ZipEntry is a directory.
      static Predicate<ZipEntry> FILE
      A predicate which tests if a ZipEntry is a file.

        public static File getCanonicalFile(ZipFile zip)
                             throws IOException
        Returns a File representing the canonical pathname of the specified zip file.
        Parameters:
        zip - the specified zip file
        Returns:
        a file representing the canonical pathname of the specified zip file
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • open

        public static ZipFile open(File path)
                    throws ZipException,
                           IOException
        Opens the specified zip file for reading.
        Parameters:
        path - the specified zip file
        Returns:
        a new ZipFile object given the specified zip file
        Throws:
        ZipException - if a zip format error has occurred
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getEntries

        public static Iterable<? extends ZipEntry> getEntries(ZipFile zip)
        Returns all the entries in the specified zip file.
        Parameters:
        zip - the specified zip file
        Returns:
        an Iterable containing all the entries (files and directories) from the specified zip file

      • toByteArray

        public static byte[] toByteArray(ZipFile zip,
                 ZipEntry entry)
                          throws IOException
        Returns a byte array containing all bytes from the specified zip entry.
        Parameters:
        zip - the zip file in which to find the zip entry
        entry - the specified zip entry
        Returns:
        a byte array containing all bytes from the specified zip entry
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • toString

        public static String toString(ZipFile zip,
              ZipEntry entry,
              Charset charset)
                       throws IOException
        Returns a string containing all the characters from the given zip entry, using the specified charset. Does not close the zip file. The entry must not be a directory to avoid an IllegalArgumentException.
        Parameters:
        zip - the zip file in which to find the zip entry
        entry - the given zip entry
        charset - the character set to use when reading the zip entry
        Returns:
        a string containing all the characters from the specified zip entry
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified entry is a directory
        See Also:
        Charsets

      • readLines

        public static List<String> readLines(ZipFile zip,
                     ZipEntry entry,
                     Charset charset)
                              throws IOException
        Returns all of the lines from the specified zip entry using the specified charset. The lines do not include line-termination characters, but do include other leading and trailing whitespace.
        Parameters:
        zip - the zip file in which to find the zip entry
        entry - the specified zip entry
        charset - the charset used to decode the zip entry
        Returns:
        a mutable List containing all the lines from a zip entry
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        IllegalArgumentException - if the specified entry is a directory

      • hash

        public static com.google.common.hash.HashCode hash(ZipFile zip,
                                   ZipEntry entry,
                                   com.google.common.hash.HashFunction hashFunction)
                                            throws IOException
        Computes and returns the hash code for the specified zip entry using the given hash function.
        Parameters:
        zip - the zip file in which to find the zip entry
        entry - the specified zip entry
        hashFunction - the given hash function
        Returns:
        hash code for the specified zip entry using the given hash function
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • create

        public static ZipOutputStream create(File path)
                              throws IOException
        Returns a zip output stream to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        path - the specified file
        Returns:
        a zip output stream to the specified file.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • startZipEntry

        public static ZipEntry startZipEntry(ZipOutputStream out,
                     String name)
                              throws IOException
        Begins writing a new ZipEntry and positions the stream to the start of the entry data. Closes the current entry if still active. The default compression method and the current time will be used.
        Parameters:
        out - the specified zip output stream
        name - the name of the new entry
        Returns:
        the newly created zip entry
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
